content.question: The setting on the machine is now changed so that the person burns f(t)+c calories per minute. For this setting, find c so that an average of 15 calories per minute is burned during the time interval 6≤t≤18.

frqParts.text: The setting on the machine is now changed so that the person burns f(t)+c calories per minute. For this setting, find c so that an average of 15 calories per minute is burned during the time interval 6≤t≤18.

topic.text: 8.1: Finding the Average Value of a Function on an Interval

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
